amendatorysection.para: Any county, township, precinct, city or village in the State of Nebraska may issue bonds to construct or to aid in the construction of a highway bridge across any boundary river of the state.

annotation.para: County may issue bonds to construct or aid in the construction of a highway wagon bridge across a boundary stream. Ahern v. Richardson County, 127 Neb. 659, 256 N.W. 515 (1934).
